message: What version of the epio command-line client do you have (epio --version)?

It seems to be grabbing some but not all. My setup is the following:

/cafeproject/

.../static/
	.../js/
	.../images/
	.../css/

.../templates/
	.../index.html

hello.py

epio.ini/

[wsgi]

# Location of your requirements file
entrypoint = hello:app
requirements = requirements.txt


[static]

# Serve the static directory directly as /static
/static = static_root

I have also tried /static = static but I get the same results. Any ideas?
ok, my fault not ep.io's ! figured it out.
@jramz Care to say what it was? The more information we have, the quicker it can be to tell people their problem!

of course! , but embarrassing really. Some files were being looked for in /static/static/images instead of static/images. Just switched around some files and got it working. Just needed to check where the files were being searched for.
